home.title: Capturing Moments, Creating Memories
home.subtitle: Welcome to my digital corner. I am a photographer passionate about capturing unique moments and telling stories through light. My work spans documentary, architecture, and landscape photography, always with an authentic and emotional approach.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hi! I'm Oscar Durán, a photographer passionate about capturing beauty in everyday details. My journey in photography began over a decade ago, and since then, I haven't stopped exploring the world through my lens.
about.p2: I specialize in documentary and landscape photography, always seeking the story hidden behind each scene. I believe a good photograph not only shows what something looks like, but how it feels.
about.p3: This portfolio is a collection of moments that have moved me, and I hope they inspire you too.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p1: Interested in collaborating or have a question about my work? I'd love to hear from you.
contact.p2: You can reach me via my email:
